api_list.name: verify_api_v1_auth_verify_get
api_list.description: Verify token by listing the permissions of the access token
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ezml1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/auth/verify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ezml1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: summary_api_v1_metrics_summary_get
api_list.description: Gets a summary of the statistics for a timeframe: requests and model_usage
